description: Blame It On Brazil ? Capoeira ? It all started in Brazil. It's sexy as hell to watch and also quite sacred. So as not to offend our Brazilian friends our Aussie friends gave it a choreographic tweak and an Aussie twist (hence the footie-shorts). Two sexy guys Carlos Ferrere and Clinton Williamson do a quick, slick routine before horniness got the better of them. You can't mistake their hunger for each other as Clinton finally let's himself cop-it from the spicy Latino Carlos. It's another hot, 100% unique Aussie special!
title: Cum On Aussie, Scene #04
